metroflex_gym_system.overview: MetroFlex Gym operates three distinct business verticals: (1) Original MetroFlex Arlington gym (OPERATIONAL), (2) MetroFlex Miami HQ (PROSPECT - Pre-sale starting March 2026, opens June 2026), and (3) MetroFlex Licensing Program for nationwide expansion. This knowledge base covers gym operations and licensing ONLY.
metroflex_gym_system.scope: THIS KNOWLEDGE BASE IS FOR METROFLEX GYM & LICENSING ONLY. Does NOT include event registration, ticketing, or sponsorships - those are handled by MetroFlex Events system.

operational_locations.name: The Original MetroFlex Gym
operational_locations.legacy: Home gym of 8x Mr. Olympia Ronnie Coleman, 2x Arnold Classic Champion Branch Warren
operational_locations.current_business: Active memberships, day passes, personal training

prospect_locations.name: MetroFlex Miami HQ
prospect_locations.current_business: Lead generation, Founder's Membership pre-sales (limited to 100), prospect nurturing
prospect_locations.important_note: Miami is NOT open yet. This is a lead generation opportunity. Founder's Memberships are pre-sales for future access.

arlington_gym_memberships.overview: The Original MetroFlex Gym in Arlington, TX offers day passes and memberships for hardcore training in the legendary facility that produced champions.

benefits: Single-day access to legendary MetroFlex Arlington
Train where Ronnie Coleman and Branch Warren trained
Access to all equipment and training areas

facilities: Legendary free weight area (dumbbells up to 200 lbs)
Cardio equipment (limited - this is a hardcore gym)

location_details.address: The Original MetroFlex Gym, Arlington, TX

important_notes: This is a HARDCORE gym - no air conditioning, raw training environment
No judgment zone - all levels welcome from beginners to pros
Competitive bodybuilders and powerlifters train here daily
Tour the gym where Ronnie Coleman trained during his Olympia reign

miami_gym_prospect.overview: ⚠️ IMPORTANT: MetroFlex Miami HQ is NOT operational yet. This is a PROSPECT/LEAD GENERATION opportunity. We are taking Founder's Membership pre-sales (March 1, 2026) for a gym that will open June 1, 2026. State-of-the-art hardcore training facility planned for South Beach area.

benefits: Lifetime gym access (no recurring fees EVER)

benefits: Access to all equipment and training areas

personal_training.overview: Elite coaching from NPC-certified trainers and former competitors
personal_training.contest_prep_special: 12-week contest prep package - $2,400 (includes nutrition, posing, training)

grand_opening.opening_event: Free workout day + meet & greet with Ronnie Coleman and Branch Warren

grand_opening.limited_availability: Only 100 Founder's Memberships available - first come, first served

metroflex_licensing.overview: MetroFlex Licensing Program allows qualified gym owners to open MetroFlex-branded facilities. Leverage the legendary name with full operational support.

licensing_packages.description: Complete turnkey package for building a new MetroFlex gym from scratch
includes: 20-year exclusive territory license
Complete MetroFlex branding package (logos, signage, marketing materials)
Architectural gym layout and design consultation
Equipment sourcing partnerships (20% discount with preferred vendors)
Staff training program (2-week on-site training at Arlington HQ)
Marketing launch package (website, social media templates, local advertising)
Operations manual (300+ pages covering all procedures)
Ongoing support (monthly coaching calls, annual in-person visits)
Access to MetroFlex Events promoter network
Co-branded apparel for resale (wholesale pricing)
licensing_packages.ideal_for: Entrepreneurs building a new gym or converting existing space over 5,000 sq ft

licensing_packages.description: Rebrand your existing gym as a MetroFlex location
includes: 15-year exclusive territory license
Complete MetroFlex branding package
Existing gym audit and optimization recommendations
Equipment assessment and upgrade consultation
Staff training program (1-week on-site training)
Marketing rebrand package
Operations manual
Ongoing support (quarterly coaching calls)
Access to MetroFlex Events promoter network
Co-branded apparel for resale
licensing_packages.ideal_for: Existing gym owners with 3,000+ sq ft looking to rebrand under legendary MetroFlex name
licensing_packages.requirements: Gym must have been operational for at least 2 years with verified membership base

ongoing_fees.marketing_fund: $500/month contribution to national MetroFlex marketing fund

qualification_requirements: Gym industry experience (owner or management role, 3+ years preferred)
Suitable location with 3,000+ sq ft (New Build) or existing gym (Rebrand)
Proof of funds (bank statement showing required capital)

application_process.action: Submit initial inquiry form at metroflexlicensing.com (launching March 1, 2026)
Phone interview with Brian Dobson or licensing team (30-45 min)
Submit full application with business plan, financials, and location details
In-person visit to proposed location (travel at applicant's expense)
Sign licensing agreement and pay initial license fee
Begin onboarding and training (6-12 weeks before grand opening)

metroflex_licensing.success_stories: Join the legacy - Arlington location has produced 8x Mr. Olympia Ronnie Coleman, 2x Arnold Classic Champion Branch Warren, and hundreds of NPC/IFBB champions.

beta_program.beta_incentive: First 3 licensees receive $10,000 discount on New Build package ($50,000 total)

support_structure.dedicated_success_coach: Assigned from day 1 through first year
support_structure.monthly_group_calls: All MetroFlex licensees connect for best practices
support_structure.annual_conference: Mandatory annual conference at Arlington HQ (3 days)
support_structure.24_7_support_portal: Access to operations manual, training videos, marketing assets
support_structure.emergency_hotline: Direct line to Arlington HQ for urgent issues

financial_projections.roi_projection: 3-5 years to full ROI on initial investment
financial_projections.ongoing_profitability: $10,000-20,000/month net profit after expenses and royalties

ordering.in_gym_sales: Available at MetroFlex Arlington front desk and MetroFlex Miami (June 2026)
ordering.event_sales: Pop-up shop at all MetroFlex Events championships

metroflex_apparel.size_recommendation_tool: AI-powered size recommender available on product pages (inputs: height, weight, preferred fit)
metroflex_apparel.returns: 30-day return policy for unworn items with tags attached. Exchange or store credit only.

common_questions.question: What's the difference between Arlington and Miami memberships?
common_questions.answer: Arlington is the legendary original gym (since 1983) with hardcore training environment. Miami HQ (opening June 2026) is a state-of-the-art facility with more amenities. Both maintain the MetroFlex hardcore culture. Founder's Memberships at Miami include access to future MetroFlex locations nationwide.

common_questions.question: When does MetroFlex Miami open?
common_questions.answer: MetroFlex Miami HQ is scheduled to open June 1, 2026. Founder's Lifetime Memberships ($2,500) are limited to first 100 members and go on sale March 1, 2026. This is a one-time payment for lifetime access with no recurring fees.

common_questions.question: How can I open a MetroFlex gym in my city?
common_questions.answer: MetroFlex Licensing Program launches March 1, 2026. We offer New Build License ($60,000) and Rebrand License ($40,000) packages. Visit metroflexlicensing.com to apply. Requirements include $150,000 liquid capital, industry experience, and suitable location.

common_questions.question: What sizes do you have for hoodies?
common_questions.answer: Most apparel items are available in S, M, L, XL, 2XL, and 3XL. Hoodies specifically are available in M-3XL. We offer an AI-powered size recommendation tool on product pages - just enter your height, weight, and preferred fit.

common_questions.question: Can I try a day pass at MetroFlex Miami before committing to membership?
common_questions.answer: Yes! Day passes are $25/day with no commitment. We also offer a 10-Pack Punch Card for $199 (save $51) with no expiration date.

common_questions.question: What's included in the Founder's Lifetime Membership?
common_questions.answer: For $2,500 one-time payment, you get LIFETIME access to MetroFlex Miami (no recurring fees ever), access to all future MetroFlex locations nationwide, Founder's plaque on wall, exclusive merch package, priority event access, 10% apparel discount for life, and guest privileges (2 guests per visit). Limited to first 100 members only.

common_questions.question: How much does it cost to license a MetroFlex gym?
common_questions.answer: New Build License is $60,000 (20-year exclusive territory) and Rebrand License is $40,000 (15-year exclusive territory). Ongoing fees include 5% royalty (capped at $2,500/month) + $500/month marketing fund. First 3 beta licensees receive $10,000 discount.

common_questions.question: Do I need gym experience to get a license?
common_questions.answer: Preferred but not absolutely required. We look for 3+ years of gym industry experience (owner or management role) plus minimum $150,000 liquid capital beyond the license fee. Passion for hardcore training culture is essential.

common_questions.question: Where can I buy MetroFlex apparel?
common_questions.answer: MetroFlex Apparel launches February 15, 2026 at metroflexapparel.com. Products will also be available at MetroFlex Arlington front desk, MetroFlex Miami (June 2026), and at all MetroFlex Events championships.

common_questions.question: Do you offer personal training?
common_questions.answer: Yes! MetroFlex Miami offers personal training from NPC-certified trainers and former competitors. Single session: $80/hour. Package deals: 10 sessions for $700 ($70/hr), 20 sessions for $1,200 ($60/hr). We also offer 12-week contest prep package for $2,400 (includes nutrition, posing, training).

troubleshooting.issue: Apparel size recommendation tool not working
troubleshooting.solution: Ensure JavaScript is enabled in your browser. Clear cache and cookies. Contact support@metroflexapparel.com if issue persists.
Founder's Memberships are limited to first 100 members only. If sold out, consider Annual Membership ($899/year) which offers excellent value and similar benefits minus lifetime access.
Email brian@metroflexgym.com with subject 'Licensing Inquiry'. Response time is typically 48-72 hours. Check spam folder.
Specific Miami location address will be announced by April 1, 2026. It will be in South Beach area. Join the waitlist at metroflexmiami.com (launching March 1) for location updates.

arlington_gym.address: The Original MetroFlex Gym, Arlington, TX

metroflex_contact.scope_note: For event registration, ticketing, or sponsorships, those are handled by MetroFlex Events system. This knowledge base is for GYM & LICENSING ONLY.

ai_ml_integration_notes.note: This RAG is for MetroFlex GYM & LICENSING ONLY. ML models for lead scoring, churn prediction, size recommendation, and licensing qualification are specific to gym operations.
lead_scoring_model_inputs: engagement_score (number of questions asked, time spent)
timeline_urgency (mentions March 1 launch, May 15 deadline, 'how soon')
authority_level (business plan, capital requirements, wholesale inquiries)
churn_prediction_inputs: engagement_frequency (gym visits per week for Miami members)
event_participation (registered for competitions, attended as spectator)
licensing_qualification_score_inputs: industry_experience_years (number of years in gym industry)
ai_ml_integration_notes.cross_referencing_protocol: If user asks about event registration, ticketing, vendor booths, or sponsorships - DO NOT answer from this knowledge base. Politely refer to metroflexevents.com or state 'That's handled by our events team at brian@metroflexgym.com'. ML may adapt to cross-reference ONLY if explicitly needed for gym context (e.g., member asks about competing at MetroFlex Events).
